50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin Maimun said:"The Companions of Muhammad [SAW] told me that the Messenger of Allah [SAW] used to seek refuge with Allah from stinginess, cowardice, the trials of the heart and the torment of the grave

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from the Trials of This World
